-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | 'Show' instances for Lambdabot
--   
--   Show instances for functions and IO procedures
@package show
@version 0.6

module ShowFun
instance Typeable a => Show (IO a)
instance (Typeable a, Typeable b) => Show (a -> b)
